title: Meeting Hearts
description: This is a collection of three romantic one-shot manga stories written and drawn in different times.The first one-shot (Meeting Wishes) describes at the same time the day of a job-less young woman and the day of a guy at work. They don't know each other and have a different life but still their thoughts meet together as they wish for the same thing.The second story (Wait-Her) talks about a girl who is unlucky in love. All her previous boyfriends have left her. She decides not to search for love anymore, but then suddenly she falls again for the first cute guy she sees.Will he be the right one this time?The third story (Melting Pages) is about a girl who has a boring normal life. She wants it to be more interesting like in a movie. Then a guy at her class remembers about her birthday. But he won't give her the present he has prepared unless she accepts him as her boyfriend. Will this be the change she was waiting for?
author: Stela Canga
